name: arraySome
description: Calls a given closure/function with every element in a given array and returns true if one of the closure calls returns true

params.name: closure
params.description: Function/closure that implements the following constructor [function(any value[,numeric index,array array]):boolean].

params.name: maxThreads
params.description: Maximum number of threads executed, ignored when argument "parallel" is set to false

links.title: Map, Reduce and other Higher Order Functions
links.description: A Primer for map, reduce, filter, and Higher Order Functions in general.
